caption.p:
Differences in the standard ellipse areas (SEAs) among the four supercolonies of L. humile ( solid line ellipses and open dots) established in Kobe, Hyogo, Japan, and among baseline organisms (arthropods) ( dashed line ellipses and filled dots) collected within the sampling site of each supercolony (LH1/LH4, LH2, and LH3), calculated from the δ 13C and δ 15N biplot data using the R package “SIBER”
32 .
